title: A quiet 3 Bd / 2 Ba House in Mesa Verde, remodeled, Solar Panels & AC
desc: I’m looking to find a well employed family. to rent out my recently remodeled 3 bedroom with 2 bath house in Costa Mesa.  All new tiled bathrooms, new toilets, vanities and flooring. Nice washer and dryer in garage. The house, large 4 bedroom, 3 baths is located in the Mesa Verde Section of Costa Mesa, CA.  Close to beaches, bike paths, shopping centers, etc.  A very secure and quiet section of town. , The Master Bedroom size 15x15, has 1 attached bath, with new toilet, vanity and new tiles around shower.  The other 2 bedrooms are approx. 13x12.  The 2nd bath has all new tub, tiles, and toilet.  3 car parking in driveway, and 1 car in garage.  , The kitchen has been remodeled with new granite countertops, stone flooring, new cabinets, and gas oven.  , The house comes with Solar Panels and an EV charging port in the garage. A deluxe Washer and Dryer are in the garage was well.  It has central AC unit in the home, and has a cool ocean breeze most days throughout the year.  There is a fenced in back yard for a dog to stay secure, and a dog door to get in and out, if needed. , Must be fully employed with a very stable job.  No history of drugs or drinking problems.  Must keep house clean,  and pay the rent on the first few days of each month.  A complete background check and credit report must be completed at time of application. , Rent is $3800.00 per month, plus $5000.00 for security deposit. Any interested parties please contact Steve at  show contact info, .  Thanks for the interest.

title: VERY PRIVATE & SECURE DETACHED NEW GUEST HOUSE W PRIVATE BACK YARD
desc: If you can see this ad, it is still available.  , The Main house is located on a very quiet cul-de-sac with a stand alone GUEST HOUSE at rear of the property.  This listing is for the guest house.  It is very private and secure.  It is NOT visible from the street.  It has its own private backyard with paver patio and gas for grill.  What sets this house apart from 99% of its competition is the details.  It was originally built for family so there are too many upgrades to list, ex:  upgraded sound proof insulation, double 5/8" drywall, high end soaking tub...     Brand new construction.  Lennox top of the line Central A/C and ultra High Efficiency furnace.  Tankless water heater.  New Washer/Dryer included.   All upper end new appliances included:  stove, fridge (with in-door water and ice-maker), dishwasher, and microwave.  Water softener.  No expense spared.  Custom built maple cabs with soft-close hinges.  Deep SS sink.  Ultra quiet disposal.  Floating countertop can be a second option for an eating area.  Hunter Douglas shutters.  Open wrought iron stair case. Dimmer switches.  Brazilian granite.  Moen fixtures. Toto toilet.  Tons of extra storage.  Tiles throughout.  Nest wi-fi thermostat.  Nest CO/Smoke detectors.  5 HD Security Cameras.  Peek-a-boo mountain views.  All windows have nice views of trees.  Bedroom is 11' x 10'4".  Walking distance to Craig Park.  Close to downtown Brea, 57 Freeway, and Brea Mall.  Centrally located to the beach, Los Angeles, and Disneyland.  Parking is on driveway.  No pets due to severe allergies.  No smokers.  Available for 1 person occupancy only.  We are looking for a quiet tenant who will take good care of the property as if it were their own., Trash and Gardener included.  Has its own separate: Electric, Gas, and Cable utilities.  Options for Spectrum Cable and AT&T are available.  Water is metered and will be billed monthly.  The garage portion is for rent for an extra $400/mo., There will be a shed built on the concrete pad in the future for the main house.  The block walls are getting stuccoed.  There will be a gate installed in the future.  $40/month fee for high speed internet option.  Credit Check, Background Check, Employment Verification, and 2 months security Deposit required.

title: 7he actual square footage.
desc: Located on a tranquil street in Laguna Canyon, this beautiful light and bright home has been lovingly updated yet still retains the quintessential classic cottage charm. With hardwood floors throughout, high open beamed ceilings in some rooms and multiple doors with paned glass windows that let in abundant natural light and make indoor/outdoor living easy, this home feels larger than the actual square footage. The kitchen has been updated with butcher block and white tile countertops, a dishwasher and offers plenty of counter space. The spacious living room has a door that leads to the private patio and yard. Bathroom has also been updated and there is an indoor laundry room. Closet space is not an issue with a walk in closet plus 3 other closets. Fully fenced lot is very private and lush including 3 brick patios plus a large yard. The detached garage also features the high open beamed ceilings. Fantastic location that is just a short stroll to the beach, festivals, shops, art galleries & restaurants and offers quick access to travel corridors in all directions.

title: Anaheim Family Home
desc: Located in the heart of Anaheim, this upgraded single level home features 3-bedrooms and 2-bathrooms. Opening the front door, you are welcomed into a bright, airy and perfectly suited remodeled home that anyone would love. The spacious living room features two large windows pulling in plenty of natural light and beautiful warm colored hardwood floors that flow through the main living spaces. The intimate dining room features a warm fireplace that creates a relaxing space to enjoy memorable meals or game nights.  Flowing seamlessly from the dining room is a designer kitchen that anyone would love to cook in. The well- appointed kitchen showcases custom cabinets, granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances, beautiful tile flooring and two windows gazing into the backyard. Three pristine and spacious bedrooms along with 2 large, remodeled bathrooms makes this home ideal for family living or work-from-home opportunities. The large, lush backyard features a covered porch and creates a perfect place to relax or entertain family and friends. Additional features include crown molding, baseboards, smooth ceilings, dual-pane windows, new air conditioning unit, indoor laundry, RV parking and a 2-car detached garage are some of the amazing details of this home. This wonderful home is conveniently located near schools, shops and restaurants. Good credit only, please email for info and showing.

Mr. Wakeham is very responsive and professionals at what he does. I am very pleased with his work and help. He looked out for y best interest even pointed out several items that needed repairs or attention. I highly recommend him and will refer anyone looking for a residence to Mr. Wakeham. - David N.

title: Irvine - Westpark-Detached, Gourmet kitchen, light and Bright, Great L
desc: This spacious beautiful three bedroom and a loft single family detached home is located on a corner lot at the end of a quiet street. Distinguished award winning Plaza Vista elementary school is minutes away. Vaulted ceilings and lots of windows make this home extremely light and bright. Upgraded features include newer downstairs laminate flooring, newer paint and baseboards. The only carpeting in the house is located on the stairs and it is brand newer. Kitchen has stainless steel appliances and opens up to the family room with beautiful built in entertainment center and cozy fireplace. The downstairs bathroom has been redone with a newer vanity and counter top, newer faucet and newer light fixture, and toilet. The living room and dining room are just off the entry way. The loft makes for a great play room, office or den. Master bedroom is spacious and the master bath has a large tub and double sinks. There is also a walk-in closet with mirrored doors. The other two bedrooms upstairs have mirrored closet doors. The attached two car garage has shelves for storage. Large back yard with grass and separate patio area. Positano is a highly desirable neighborhood. Other amenities include community pools, spas, and a tennis court. Centrally located near shopping centers and restaurants. Refrigerator, washer and dryer are included with out warranty. Gardener is also included. Submit on pets.

title: This Old House for Rent
desc: $1,850.00 Front House for rent. 2Bd/1ba detached home in Buena Park. Owner occupies rear property. This is a real RENTAL BY OWNER, not a scam or 'come-on' by a listing agent., Month-to-Month (w/30-day notice), but hopefully long-term rental. Short-term OK also., Available after January 1, 2021 prorated to the first of the month., Deposit to match monthly rent, plus $150 utility deposit., Utilities (City water bill, gas, electricity) paid to owner (prorated to coincide with rents)., Get a $90 monthly credit to offset rear property utilities (avg. $45/mo usage) while occupied., There will be a non-refundable application fee of $35/first adult, $25/additional adults – undisclosed tenancy will void rental contract., Why the low price?, Home is old and in somewhat poor condition, but improving it only raises the value/rent and people need low cost rent these days. Zillow suggests rent (assuming standard conditions) of $2,850., Home is normally 4bd/1ba, but has been closed off to only allow 2bd/1ba (the remainder is used for owners' storage w/separate access)., Home is single family detached, but shares front yard and utilities with the rear property., No backyard access available, so no pets can be allowed for this rental., No garage. ONE designated parking space on-site. Additional street parking can be in high demand., Tenant agrees monthly to conditions being acceptable for the rent/price. It is what it is and it ain't for everyone, but it's a house., Includes:, 2 bedrooms or 1 bedroom and 1 office/den/storage room, 1 bathroom, Laundry room, Living room w/cast iron fireplace (Franklin stove), Dining room/area, Kitchen w/dining area or storage space, Front porch, 1 designated, uncovered parking space on-site, Unfurnished. However, stove, refrigerator, washer and dryer can be supplied w/acceptable terms., Heating: Wall furnace &/or fireplace, Cooling: none, Yard maintenance is included, This listing is available until a signed contract w/deposit – then ad will be removed. I will not respond to lazy/wasteful texts asking if the listing is available and don't answer unrecognized callers. Only interested prospects who've read this ad should respond – READ THE LISTING BEFORE CONTACTING. Initially, text is preferred, then phone call/leave message. Indicate you've read the listing and I'll be impressed. I will be responsive to those who are diligent. Shown by appointment only.  show contact info

title: Beautiful 3 Bedroom 2 Bath Home in Old Town
desc: CALL OR TEXT  show contact info,  TO ARRANGE A TIME TO VIEW THE HOME.  , ALTHOUGH THIS HOME HAS BEEN LOVINGLY RESTORED WITH MODERN CONVENIENCES SUCH AS FORCED AC/HEAT, DISHWASHER, ETC, THE HOME WAS BUILT BEFORE CARS WERE POPULAR -- HENCE THE REASON THERE IS NO GARAGE -- BUT THERE IS AMPLE PARKING IN FRONT AND ON SIDE OF THE HOME.  And if garage storage is your thing, we have you covered: literally. The home has a basement and large Tuff shed., This amazingly restored house was built in 1905 and has 3 bedrooms/2 bathrooms and is located on one of the most desirable streets in in Old Towne Orange (just steps from the Orange Circle). In 2019 the restoration of the home was judged by the Old Towne Preservation Association, which awarded its "President's Award" for restoration excellence. , The ideal tenant to occupy this home is someone who loves historic homes, architecture, all things vintage, and understands how special of a historic home this is to all of Southern California., Our work restoring these homes (and others) has received numerous awards and has been featured online and in various local and national newspapers and periodicals.  Search "historic home row" on Instagram or Facebook or view one of the numerous feature stories here: https://savingplaces.org/stories/q-a-a-local-developers-take-on-preserving-old-towne-oranges-historic-cottages#.X8m2X2hKjqc, This meticulously restored home comes with: , *Awesome kitchen that comes equipped with a $5,000 refrigerator, * Large front porch, *Large, private and professionally landscaped front yard, backyard and side yard with separate entrance, *Private, in-unit washer and dryer, *Restored, original hardwood floors, *Original coved 10' plaster ceilings, *Period correct tile throughout , *Forced air conditioning/heating unit , *Period specific light fixtures and switches, *Hunter Douglas window coverings, *Restored original doors , *Way, way too many custom features to list - the bottom line is: if you can find a nicer home at a better price, you should rent it., No smoking/no pets and 1 year lease. Deposit is $4,250 and we know that sounds expensive -- but this home is 100 percent custom and as an example, just one light fixture cost $1,500. And guess what -- if you don't do any damage, you'll get your deposit back!
attributes: house, w/d in unit, no smoking, off-street parking

desc: READ ENTIRE POST! , We are a very nice, easy-going, looking to help someone out, and vice versa, Organizing and yard work, cleaning horses, painting, remodeling home, Hard work. Yard work?, If the ad is still up the room and bathroom are still available. Nice large house with horses. don't need to have experience with horses., looking for someone with NO commitments and , NOT going to school or, NOT have a job., NO Animals, WE ARE CORONA VIRUS SAFE Must stay at home., This is about getting me organized. YOU MUST BE A SELF STARTER!!! In exchange for food, and a room. and a very peaceful environment. You will have a lot of your own privacy., Don't flake, I will not give you a second chance. This is a great opportunity for a lucky someone.

title: +Home 1 Mile to Disney / 4 bedrooms / 3 bath+
desc: Home 1 Mile to Disney / 4 bedrooms / 3 bath ! $3,200 monthly rent + 2 month deposit, Two master suites one with Cal King Bed and private bath, one with Queen bed and private bath.  Two  bedrooms both with full over full bunk beds and share a bathroom in the hall.  All bedrooms have 43' plasmas TV's with cable.  , All bedrooms have upgraded carpet. Laminate wood and tile floors throughout the rest of the home. Open concept kitchen with custom cherry wood paneled cabinetry with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. The dining room seats eight comfortably. Home has central heating and air conditioning, There is a beautiful pool in the rear yard, with natural gas BBQ and outdoor seating. All furniture, furnishings are brand new as of Apr 2012 (can be rented unfurnished upon request). The home was remodeled inside and out.  , Parking for 2 vehicles, Minimum Stay 3 months, Gas, electric, trash, water, sewer included, To view, call or text Craig or leave number ., Fully Furnished, Modern 1BR in the heart of Koreatown w/ Gym + Spa, Rates may vary upon exact move in and move out dates. We also offer custom pricing for any duration., Book now the lowest rate for a 12+ months lease at $2,480 / mo., Indicative prices/duration:, 6 months lease: from $2,650 / mo, 3 months lease: from $2,690 / mo, 2 months lease: from $2,740 / mo, 1 month lease: from $2,790 / mo, *Prices quoted are: (1) based on moving in the first day the unit becomes available, (2) applicable only if billed upfront; can be higher if billed in multiple payments, and (3) exclusive of any taxes or utilities., Show up and start living from day one in Los Angeles with this cheery one-bedroom Blueground, apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and, fully-equipped Koreatown, home. (ID #LAX30), Designed With You In Mind, As with any Blueground apartment, you’ll find a thoughtfully designed space complete with beautiful furniture and a, fully-equipped kitchen in this one-bedroom property. And, thanks to our superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and, towels, you can relax knowing you’ll always feel comfortably at home. When you’re ready for some fun, you can take in, the Los Angeles vibes or bring the entertainment to you with the premium wireless speaker or smart, TV. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry., Sleeping Arrangements, King Bed, 70.8in/180cm, Amenities, Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:, - Pet Friendly, - Swimming Pool, - Gym, - Indoor Parking, - Roof Deck, - Garden, - Bike Storage, - Elevator, Arrival and ongoing support, The entire apartment is yours to enjoy! You’ll either be personally greeted by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions., Throughout your stay, you’ll have access to our Client Experience team around the clock through the Blueground App. You can schedule additional cleanings, submit maintenance requests, and view our neighborhood recommendations with just a few taps., We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay., Ideally Located, This lovely furnished rental is located in Koreatown, a trendy LA neighborhood with amazing proximity and much to offer. With a central location, Hollywood, Mid-Wilshire, and DTLA are only 15 mins away. Koreatown has transformed to a co-mingling, vibrant city of diverse young professionals. You certainly won’t have trouble finding a bite to eat or a place to relax at the end of the evening with hip bars and restaurants in the neighborhood. The area's multiple Metro stops makes hopping between Koreatown's attractions all the easier from Western to Vermont, and Beverly to Olympic., A Few Things To Note, This Blueground apartment can be booked for a minimum of one month, to a year or more., Pets are welcome, though weight limits and breed restrictions apply and may incur fees., Parking is offered based on availability and is subject to a fee., As guidelines evolve around COVID-19, certain community amenities may have temporarily restricted access., We take great pride in ensuring every photo displayed is shot in our own apartments with our actual furnishings. That said, we regularly refresh our decor and furniture arrangement, which may differ from what’s pictured., A single-story beach home ... now available for lease !!, A single-story beach home with no shared walls and a driveway is now available for lease. Steps from the ocean of the Peninsula in Long Beach, this lovely unfurnished home offers new carpet, a driveway for a compact car, a private patio off the living room area, fireplace in the living room, beautiful open beam ceiling, gas stove, refrigerator, bathtub/shower in tub, ceramic tile in the bathroom. This one-bedroom one-bath approximately 700 sqft. has no common walls, no one above or below. This home offers absolute privacy in the beach community and everything else the beach community has to offer - paddleboarding, kayaking, biking, walk to kitesurfing and kiteboarding beach! No pet allowed. Prefer a two-year lease. Text listing agent to schedule a private tour., New York style loft top-floor, TWO bedroom APT, Spacious and warm, top-floor, TWO bedroom, New York style loft with skylights, brick walls, wood and concrete flooring, and 21 foot raftered ceilings in the historic Kress Lofts building of downtown Long Beach. Large Master Bedroom area is complimented by a highly desirable enclosed bedroom and a third bedroom/office area accessed by circular stairway to a second floor. An abundance of closets and storage space accent a Master Bathroom with double vanity and guest bathroom with tub. Premium amenities throughout include a gas ignited eight burner Viking range/double stove, Bosch dishwasher,Samsung 4-door refrigerator, Kenmore Elite high efficiency washer/dryer, and wood-burning fireplace. One of only a few Kress Lofts units available with covered, secured parking for 3 vehicles. Luxurious downtown living steps from the gentrified North Pine Avenue area and easy walking or biking to the nearby Downtown Long Beach entertainment district, East Village, Pike at Rainbow Harbor and beaches.

title: Come home to Fairway Villas in Newport Beach. Garden-style living!
desc: Fairway Villas Apartment Homes Bedroom: 2 | Bathroom: 2Square Footage: 1200 sq ftMonthly Rent: $2525 show contact info,   Community Description  Experience the tranquility of boutique apartment living at Fairway Villas Apartment Homes. Conveniently located in Newport Beach near Eastside Costa Mesa, a short distance to award winning restaurants, shopping, entertainment and breathtaking nature trails. Choose one of our newly remodeled single story 2 bedrooms or our spacious 3-bedroom two story townhomes with private backyard. Our stunning renovation includes quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, upgraded cabinetry, custom two-tone paint, and plank flooring.Imagine the privacy of growing a garden in your very own backyard and the convenience of washer/dryer hooks ups. Our BBQ area is the perfect place to unwind and prepare a meal to take back home or enjoy by our playground. If you want a night off of cooking come down to our Taco Night, held twice a month., Our onsite management team offers stellar customer service with a personal touch. Take a tour today, we are here to help you find your dream home. title: Large house w/ 3 bdr
desc: The minimum rental lease is 3 months., > Newly remodeled contemporary house with a very spacious landscaped garden. Located less than a mile from Disneyland ticket booth, it is the perfect location !, > Completely remodeled with the addition of a master bedroom and bath, a spacious family room and an open concept kitchen. Located right off the 5 Freeway, it is easily accessible from Los Angeles and San Diego and all local airports. We are less than a mile from Disneyland entrance – a short 15min walk on well-lit streets with hotels and restaurants. The house is in top condition: new paint, new carpeting and tile floors, new kitchen and bathrooms and brand new contemporary furniture., > 1600 sq. ft., > $ 2690 / month with a $ 5400 security deposit., > All utilities + internet and direct TV included., > The house has 3 bedrooms and a large den. The master bedroom, located at the back of the house, has a King size bed with 2 night stands and dresser. It has its own bathroom and direct access to the backyard and patio area. The center bedroom is furnished with 3 twin beds (bunk-beds) . The 3rd bedroom has a Queen Size bed with 2 night stands. All bedrooms have large cabinets . We can store some parts of furniture upon request . Right of the master bedroom is a den furnished with a sofa bed: a great retreat for reading a book. Even a parking spot in the attached garage., > The 2 bathrooms were completely remodeled with contemporary tile work, cabinetry, and new shower tubs with sliding glass doors. , > Any further questions call

Large open dining and living room area on main floor, high ceilings, floor to ceiling fireplace, and a wet bar area with refrigerator! Beautiful gourmet kitchen with granite counter tops, 6 burner range, center island, 2 ovens, and 2 built-in refrigerators/freezers! Large entertaining deck, elevator, open stairway to a large family room, separate laundry room, 2 additional en-suite bedrooms... one inclusive of a walk-in closet, full bath, double vanities, and patio area! Third level contains an outstanding family room, entertainment center, incredible golf course views, an additional en-suite bedroom, and an additional storage area as well as a wine storage area! 3 car garage with workshop area and additional golf cart storage! title: Truly An Outstanding Custom Residence.
desc: Truly an outstanding custom residence located in the 24-hour guard gated community of Ritz Cove! 5 bedrooms, main floor office, 7 bathrooms, and some of the most dramatic coastline views displaying the most incredible sunsets and full on view of Catalina Island! The custom renovation of this residence includes a complete gourmet kitchen with a 6-burner Wolf range, microwave, 2 dishwashers, multiple sinks, warming drawer, wine cooler, triple reverse osmosis water in kitchen, pantry area, and varying counter tops of travertine, marble and granite! Two of the 5 fireplaces were custom made on site, new travertine flooring throughout main level, "concertina" doors along west side of home, fully paneled library with fireplace, outdoor water feature, and full bath. Venetian plaster, newer stair treads, fixers and wainscoting. Master suite has marble flooring, Jacuzzi type tub, fireplace, 2 vanities and 2 toilets, and a "most generous" walk in closet. Lower level consists of theater room with surround sound, exercise room, and a guest suite with bath and steam shower. Walk out to lower level to a pebble tech pool & spa (WIFI controlled), outdoor BBQ, & incredible ocean view patios! 3-car garage contains tile flooring and extra storage. Add'l features include all upstairs bedrooms are en-suite, whole house water filtration system & speaker system, alarm system, a wine room w/storage, and much more! Tremendous ocean & coastal views, walk to Salt Creek Beach and the Ritz Carlton!, Hi!!.... Looking for the Best Leases in Orange County? Please go to, WWW.MYOCPROPERTY.COM/HOMESEARCH

title: Room for rent in large 4 bed/3.5 bath house -$1300
desc: Looking for someone to sublease a room in a 4 bed/ 3.5 bath house 1/1-6/30. The room is a nice size, you can easily fit a queen size bed, dresser and desk, with a large closet and no shared walls. You will share a bathroom with a 25 year old, who is very easy going and currently works from home. , The house has a large living room with an open kitchen and eating area, nice appliances, wine fridge, and plenty of storage! The bedrooms are removed from the main living/shared spaces so you’re always able to have quiet time. Washer and dryer are in unit, next door to the open room which is very convenient!, There are 2 parking spots - a tandem garage and carport and plenty of street parking. , We keep it very lowkey during the week- working typical 8-5 jobs, working out before/after work and we always like to try new studios around Newport when we can; we love roomie nights drinking wine and watching a good movie together! We keep the house clean and tidy- being respectful of shared spaces. , On the weekends we like to have a good time- trying new restaurants, enjoying the beach and hanging out with friends. , We’re looking for someone who will fit in well with our lifestyle! If you think you would be a good fit please email us a little bit about yourself and send your Instagram/social. We are looking forward to meeting you!, 6 month lease with potential to extend another year!

desc: I am single mom and I have an 12 year old son. I am looking for someone to help me out 1 or 2 days a week in exchange for low rent. Instead of charging the full rent I decided to cut in mostly in half and exchange of help. We live in a beautiful 4 bedroom home and have a spare furnished room. You must be a non smoker/drug user, love kids, clean background. I do have a small shih tzu dog and she is hypoallergenic and loves people. I am preferably looking for a women, non couples (if you have a boyfriend they can spend the night only on weekends), and I don't want to live with other kids( will not make exceptions). The low rent is for one person. We live in a 4 bedroom home and the place comes fully furnished. , The room is a 12 x 10 foot room , Hall bath (mainly yours), dresser , hutch, parking, washer and dryer, $150 deposite for using my stuff. , ALL YOU NEED IS CLOTHES:), If you need to store a few things I have some garage space. , Looking for someone to move in ASAP. You must have job and the one/two days I am looking for help would be from 6pm after work and onward. , When you apply tell me a little bit about yourself. Job, experience with kids, age, current living situation?

title: coastal guard-gated communities in Monarch Beach.
desc: Welcome to Ritz Pointe, one of Dana Point's most exclusive and prestigious 24-hour, coastal guard-gated communities in Monarch Beach. This luxurious residence combines the best of ocean and golf course views, offering an open floor plan with an abundance of natural light and premier living space. Featuring exquisite hardwood flooring throughout, you enter the main living area with captivating ocean views, creating a perfect setting for entertaining and for the sunset enthusiast. The home is comprised of 3 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms with the master bedroom featuring a large walk-in closet and a private master bath en-suite with a dual vanity and a soaker tub. The lower-level offers two spacious guest rooms, full bathroom, laundry room, media/den area and a completely remodeled new open kitchen with sophisticated features. This property is set on generous lot, which includes a lavish, private yard, capturing the tranquil ocean view/breeze year-round! Situated on a single-loaded street near the end of the cul-de-sac, there is a private nature trail which leads to Salt Creek Beach, a golf course and two world-class resortsOC20254504, all of which add the pleasure and enjoyment of an ocean-close lifestyle in beautiful Southern California.

title: GATED COMMUNITY HOME
desc: ENJOY OCEAN VIEWS AND AN AMAZING OCEAN BREEZE IN THIS MOVE IN READY HOME INSIDE PRESTIGIOUS GAURD GATED COMMUNITY OF MONARCH BEACH. Freshly painted throughout. LOTS of natural lights, Open floor plan, Cozy living room with high ceiling and beautiful fireplace. Luxury marble flooring throughout downstairs and brand new carpet all upstairs. Upgraded kitchen with stainless steel appliances and breakfast nook area. Nice size yard great for entertaining with views of pacific ocean. Master bedroom with high ceiling and amazing ocean view balcony . Master bathroom with granite countertops and huge walking closet. Two car direct access garage with brand new epoxy flooring. AMAZING LOCATION ACROSS FROM MONARCH BEACH RESORT, SHORT DISTANCE FROM SALT CREEK BEACH, RITZ CARLTON. ACCESS TO MONARCH BEACH GOLF COURSE AND MONARCH BEACH TENNIS CLUB. PROXIMITY TO DANA POINT HARBOR AND LANTERN DISTRICT WITH LOTS OF SHOPS AND RESTAURANTS.

title: Monarch Beach, tastefully remodeled interiors,
desc: Located in charming Beach city of Monarch Beach, tastefully remodeled interiors, this home sits on a private cul de sac with beautiful ocean views. This Mid Century Villa features large private lot, electric gate, large gated driveway, 3 car garage, double entry doors to a courtyard nicely landscaped around pool & spa, plenty of room for entertaining or watching sail boats go by. Enter through beautiful double entry doors to formal foyer which leads to newly remodeled dining room, family room with fireplace, kitchen with all new appliances, a breakfast room & laundry room & cabana style bath & another powder room. large French doors opens to outdoors to create great indoor outdoor California style living while enjoying great ocean views. A few steps up to a great room with very high ceilings & 3 sets of sliding doors open to large balcony, one can enjoy fabulous ocean views & great natural lights, this room is perfect to enjoy fabulous art collections. On upper level a spacious master suite with fireplace, huge ocean views & balcony, master bath & walk in closet. Other features are 2 more ocean view guest bedrooms & baths plus an office or 4th bedroom. This mini estate is located in highly desirable MONARCH BAY TERRACE very close to pristine beachesLG20249395, close to great shops, restaurants & access to Laguna Beach or Dana POINT Harbor for water sport activities. Short drive to charming Corona Delmar or Newport Beach.

title: HOME IN IRVINE
desc: Quite community locates in center of Irvine. Very cozy 2,590 sq ft home sits on a 6750 sq ft lot and features 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. The double front door opens up to a family room with access to a cozy breakfast nook . There is a guest bedroom downstairs and 3 bedrooms upstairs, 2 of which share a bathroom while the master bath. French doors lead to the side and backyard patio area. HOA community includes 5 community pools/spas and Deerfield Park. Served by schools Irvine High School, Venado Middle School and Deerfield Elementary School.
